name: Masha and the Bear: Art Games
name_original: Masha and the Bear: Art Games
description:
How to combine love for drawing and the cartoon "Masha and the Bear"? Only with the new, most picturesque of all beautiful games - "Masha and the Bear: Coloring Games for all"!

Let's paint this wonderful world! Together!
- huge number of pictures for coloring
- original voice acting from the cartoon
- game in both coloring and free modes
- large selection of tools for drawing and a real space for imagination
- 5 albums for coloring with pictures from the most popular series

"I hadn’t painted something for a long time" - said Masha, suddenly she got carried away and began to create masterpieces better that Picasso! :) A game that not only enthralls, but also develops imagination and fantasy, revealing the child's creative potential!

Add life to pictures from the cartoon "Masha and the Bear", paint them with all the colors of the rainbow, you have magic brushes and many other tools – so everything is possible in this game! In addition to the usual tools like filling, there is a rainbow brush that draws with several colors at once, a magic pencil that can mix colors and weapon of true wizard - a magic wand that turns the picture into a genuine masterpiece of art!

5 albums (with 10 coloring pages in each) of the most beloved episodes of "Masha and the Bear", as well as free drawing mode will enthrall your child for a long time. In addition, the results of his work can be easily shared with friends via social networks or simply by saving the picture on the phone.

Due to the simple and intuitive interface even the small you will be able to play "Masha and the Bear: coloring games for all"! Moreover, Masha herself will describe the tools and names the colors with original and exclusive voice-over!

A bit older you will also be able to show their talents and enjoy the game, mixing colors and painting in water-colors like real artist! As for the most creative natures there is a special mode of free drawing - blank canvas, a lot of tools and boundless possibilities for creation!

It is very easy to play and develop with Indigo Kids!
